long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
bTab is speed dial like, new tab replacement that works directly and natively on your bookmarks, no thrid-party services just for sync, all works on chrome account!

In development with love, feedback and feature requests are welcome!
